overview: Jeff Palmer comes home to his one true love, Tristan Paris, in one of Falcon's most romantic videos yet. After a very hot welcome, the two lovers head out to the local bar where an unscrupulous bar-fly slips them both a 'Mickey.' Jeff, mistakenly believing that Tristan is cheating on him in the Men's Room, joins Tom Chase and Kristian Brooks in the basement for a hot fisting scene. When Tristan learns that Jeff has cheated on him, he goes to the home of a very hot, well-hung Thom Barron. Upon his return home, the two lovers make up on the window seat in a romantic, touching love scene.  Scene 1. Derek Cameron, Drew Damon  Scene 2. Jeff Palmer, Kristian Brooks, Tom Chase  Scene 3. Thom Barron, Tristan Paris  Scene 4. Jeff Palmer, Tristan Paris
title: Fever
